p: The developed models were used to forecast the dengue cases reported in the District of Gampaha from December 2015 to May 2017. Root mean squared error (RMSE), mean absolute error (MAE), mean absolute percentage difference (MAPE), and the Pierce skill score (PSS) (Additional file 1: Table S1) were calculated for the forecasts from each model and the forecasted values were plotted against reported dengue cases in the district during the forecasting period [ 25]. Sensitivity tests with receiver operating characteristics (ROC) were also performed for forecasting period to identify the sufficiency of the developed model [ 26â€“ 29].
